summary: Wiktor, who was mistreated by his father as a child, is now a tormented grown-up. He meets beautiful Tania and wants to settle down but it's not easy to get rid of childhood traumas.
cast: Michal Zebrowski|Jan Frycz|Agnieszka Grochowska|Waclaw Adamczyk|Borys Szyc|Alan Andersz|Leszek Piskorz|Jan Peszek|Dorota Kaminska|Damian Damiecki|Tadeusz Bradecki|Mikolaj Grabowski|Krystyna Rutkowska-Ulewicz|Maria Maj|Joanna Orleanska|Aleksandra Zawalska|Violetta Arlak|Miroslaw Kotowicz|Marcin Kwasny|Wojciech Mecwaldowski|Magdalena Kizinkiewicz|Lech Dyblik|Jan Jurewicz|Barbara Burska|Wojciech Kuczok|Anna Kozak|Maciej Tomaszek|Anna Jaroch|Michal Okapiec|Mateusz Maksiak|Maciej Antoniak|Piotr Nowicki|Renata Dabkowska|Eryk Kulm|Mateusz Banasiuk|Kalina Hlimi-Pawlukiewicz|Katarzyna Maria Zielinska|Katarzyna Stanislawska|Monika Zalewska|Borys Jaznicki|Rafal Kosinski|Marcin Chochlew|Monika Pikula|Jaroslaw Pietrzak|Marcin Bosak|Anna Jaroch-Okapiec
keywords: falling in love|emotional abuse|beating|based on story|violence
title: Pregi
